Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Generate your initial API key on the developer portal (See https://developer.wellsfargo.com/portal/documentation/support/how-to#get-keys) and regenerate every 24 hours by calling the Token API. Make sure to specify "Bearer" as your token type.

info.title: Credit Card Products API
info.description: The credit card procucts API allows you to get the pricing and benefits details of the given product.

get.description: This resource returns the pricing and benefits details for given product

client-request-id.description: Value you generate to track each API call. A UUID value compliant with RFC 4122 is required. The value is echoed back in the response header.

gateway-request-id.description: An Entity ID describes on whose behalf the API request is being sent. This may represent your company, a division within your company, a third party, or something else.

content_type_PARAM.name: Content-Type
content_type_PARAM.description: This header indicates the media (MIME) type of the content of the request (used with POST, PATCH and PUT requests) and the content of the response

product_code_QUERY.name: product_code
product_code_QUERY.description: A unique identifier for a credit card product.

channel_code_QUERY.name: channel_code
channel_code_QUERY.description: This field is used to identify the front-end channel a consumer enters in the Wells Fargo credit card application.

vendor_code_QUERY.description: The digital paid marketing publisher network code or the vendor identifier for consumer credit card applications.
vendor_code_QUERY.name: vendor_code

flexible_pricing_id_QUERY.description: An indicator used in the decision and pricing process.
flexible_pricing_id_QUERY.name: flexible_pricing_id

sub_channel_code_QUERY.description: The digital paid marketing channel identifier or code for consumer credit card applications presented through a URL.
sub_channel_code_QUERY.name: sub_channel_code

pricing_details_200.description: This object contains all of the product’s pricing details.
